law.catch_line: Racing Commission may promulgate administrative regulations.
law.text: The racing commission may promulgate any reasonable and necessary administrative regulation for the enforcement of the provisions of this chapter and the conduct of hearings held before it.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 470, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 26, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 26, effective March 30, 1992. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 10, effective June 17, 1978.
